description: minimal mobile SPA+rest interface in vanillajs for cordova

scripts.build: npm run builddev ; cd dist; cp woofr.min.js /tmp/. && minify /tmp/woofr.min.js > woofr.min.js
scripts.builddev: set -x; cd public/css; find -L $(pwd) -type f -name '*.css' | xargs cat > ../dist/woofr.css; cd ../js && find -L $(pwd) -type f -name '*.js' | grep -vE '(index.js)' | xargs cat > ../dist/woofr.min.js; cat index.js >> ../dist/woofr.min.js && cp ../dist/woofr.min.js ../dist/woofr.js
scripts.monitor: nodemon -i public/dist -e html,js,css -w public --exec 'npm run-script buildmonitor'
